400	European	O
400	carbon	O
400	dioxide	O
400	emissions	O
400	by	O
400	2005	O
400	.	O

401	This	O
401	European	O
401	proposal	O
401	assumes	O
401	absolute	O
401	restrictions	S-deontic
401	on	O
401	emissions	O
401	(	O

401	obtain	O
401	rights	S-deontic

401	emit	O
401	a	O

401	of	O
401	tons	O
401	of	O
401	carbon	O

401	at	O
